title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8199-4.2 - Tentative assessments of taxable State lands other than easements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8199-4.2 - Tentative assessments of taxable State lands other than easements

State Regulations
(a) In any year in
which a revaluation or update is to be implemented, for each parcel on the
preliminary list, the assessor shall enter the full value and the assessed
value as it will appear on the tentative assessment roll. (b) (1)

For
all other assessing units, the assessor shall enter the State equalization rate
for the prior assessment roll. (2)

For each parcel, the assessor shall enter the full value and the assessed value
as it will appear on the tentative assessment roll. The assessed value may not
exceed the full value of the parcel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8199-4.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
